mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, ID, NICKNAME, PW, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHMONTH, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, BANNED_STATE FROM USERS ORDER BY USER_NO

SELECT USER_NO, ID, NICKNAME, PW, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHMONTH, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, BANNED_STATE FROM USERS WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RETIRE_USERS (RETIRE_USER_NO, RETIRE_USER_ID, RETIRE_USER_NICKNAME, RETIRE_JOIN_DATE, RETIRE_DATE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{joinDate}, SYSDATE)
